urls.title: How does Book Now, Pay Later work?
urls.description: How does Book Now, Pay Later work? Choose your flight and select the Book Now, Pay Later option at the payment page. By selecting this option, you will need to pay a hold ing fee to secure your preferred booking fare for the next 72 hours. You may pay the full fare within the hold period to avoid booking cancellation. The Book Now, Pay Later fee (or holding fee) is an additional payment to secure your booking and this fee is non-refundable. The holding fee is not part of the fare. Can't find the answer
